overview:
Ms. Johnson is a former President and COO of American Lawyer Media (Court TV), an international multimedia and information services company which was acquired by TimeWarner. She is the former founding CEO of Streetmail.com, a venture-backed email publisher, and former COO of Yoyodyne Entertainment, Inc., an Internet-based direct marketing company which was acquired by Yahoo.

Ms. Johnson has served on the Board of Directors of The Vermont Teddy Bear Co. (NSDQ: BEAR) and currently serves on the Board of Directors of Automated Resources Group, Inc. and Career Camp, Inc. She received a BA with honors from the University of Michigan.
